apiCodes.BAD_REQUEST: The server could not serve your request
apiCodes.UNAUTHORIZED: You must be signed in to perform this action
apiCodes.FORBIDDEN: You do not have permission to access this resource
apiCodes.PAYLOAD_TOO_LARGE: The payload of your request is too large
apiCodes.RATE_LIMIT: The rate limit has been exceeded
apiCodes.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: An error occurred. Please try again later
apiCodes.UPSTREAM_ERROR: Some upstream services are not responding
apiCodes.INVALID_EMAIL_DOMAIN: Your email domain is not allowed to sign up
apiCodes.FALLBACK_ERROR: An error occurred. Please try again later.
apiCodes.COURSE_NOT_FOUND: The course or key could not be found
apiCodes.BUCKET_SIZE_EXCEEDED: The bucket size has been exceeded
apiCodes.BUCKET_USER_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: The maximum number of users in this bucket has been reached
apiCodes.COURSE_MAINTAINER_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: The maximum number of course maintainers has been reached
apiCodes.CANNOT_REMOVE_YOURSELF: You cannot remove yourself as a maintainer
apiCodes.TOO_MANY_USERS: You cannot invite more than 600 users at once
apiCodes.PROMPT_LIMIT_REACHED: You have reached the limit for custom prompts
apiCodes.ONLY_SCHEDULED_TASKS: Only tasks that have not yet started can be deleted
